content: this is my most popular selling design and it displays the gentle beauty of the cable this pattern is knit flat and then joined in the round using a three needle bind-off so for those with anxiety about circular knitting this pattern is even more for you for any visual learners out there the execution of the cable 8 back and cable 8 front can be viewed here 1 enjoy 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=han2bzgui3q
